languages.text: {n}Звучно щелкнув пальцами-ножницами, Тервантьяс мерзким голосом произносит:{/n} "Давай посмотрим, какие интересные повреждения у тебя имеются, и что в твоей убогой органике можно улучшить, не принеся значительных повреждений разуму. И постарайся не кричать в процессе — у нескольких образцов в ходе процедуры рвались голосовые связки. Впрочем... Ты все равно будешь кричать".

{n}With a loud click of his scissor-like fingers, Tervantias voice turns ghoulish,{/n} "Let's see what kind of interesting damage your body has taken and which parts of your miserable organics can be improved without inflicting any substantial harm on your sanity. Try not to scream — some specimens end up tearing their vocal cords during this procedure. Then again... you will scream whether you want to or not."
languages.original_text: {n}Звучно щелкнув пальцами-ножницами, Тервантьяс мерзким голосом произносит:{/n} "Давай посмотрим, какие интересные повреждения у тебя имеются, и что в твоей убогой органике можно улучшить, не принеся значительных повреждений разуму. И постарайся не кричать в процессе — у нескольких образцов в ходе процедуры рвались голосовые связки. Впрочем... Ты все равно будешь кричать".

traits.locale_text: {n}With a loud click of his scissor-like fingers, Tervantias voice turns ghoulish,{/n} "Let's see what kind of interesting damage your body has taken and which parts of your miserable organics can be improved without inflicting any substantial harm on your sanity. Try not to scream — some specimens end up tearing their vocal cords during this procedure. On second thought... Whether you want to or not, you will scream."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.speaker: Haemonculae

Try not to scream — some specimens end up tearing their vocal cords during this procedure. Then again... you will scream whether you want to or not."

languages.text: {n}Tervantias fait bruyamment cliqueter ses doigts semblables à des ciseaux et ajoute d'une voix macabre :{/n} « Voyons si votre corps souffre de lésions intéressantes et quelles parties de vos misérables organes je pourrais améliorer sans vous faire sombrer dans la folie. Je vous recommande d'éviter de crier ; vous risqueriez de vous déchirer les cordes vocales, comme cela arrive parfois au cours de cette procédure. Cela dit... je doute que vous puissiez vous en empêcher. »
languages.original_text: {n}With a loud click of his scissor-like fingers, Tervantias voice turns ghoulish,{/n} "Let's see what kind of interesting damage your body has taken and which parts of your miserable organics can be improved without inflicting any substantial harm on your sanity. Try not to scream — some specimens end up tearing their vocal cords during this procedure. Then again... you will scream whether you want to or not."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tervantias fait bruyamment cliqueter ses doigts semblables à des ciseaux et ajoute d'une voix macabre :{/n} « Voyons si votre corps souffre de lésions intéressantes et quelles parties de vos misérables organes je pourrais améliorer sans vous faire sombrer dans la folie. Je vous recommande d'éviter de crier ; vous risqueriez de vous déchirer les cordes vocales, comme cela arrive parfois au cours de cette procédure. Cela dit... je doute que vous puissiez vous en empêcher. »
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}特万提亚斯剪刀般的手指发出了“咔嚓”一声，声音变得阴森恐怖。{/n}“让我看看你的身体受到了什么有趣的伤害，看看你那可怜的有机躯体有哪些部分可以改善，而又不会对你的理智造成重大伤害。尽量别使劲喊，因为有些实验对象会在手术过程中把声带喊裂，但话说回来……你肯定会放声尖叫。就算你不想，恐怕也无济于事。”
languages.original_text: {n}With a loud click of his scissor-like fingers, Tervantias voice turns ghoulish,{/n} "Let's see what kind of interesting damage your body has taken and which parts of your miserable organics can be improved without inflicting any substantial harm on your sanity. Try not to scream — some specimens end up tearing their vocal cords during this procedure. Then again... you will scream whether you want to or not."

traits.locale_text: {n}特万提亚斯剪刀般的手指发出了“咔嚓”一声，声音变得阴森恐怖。{/n}“让我看看你的身体有没有受到什么有趣的伤害。”
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}Mit einem vernehmlichen Klicken seiner scherengleichen Finger nimmt Tervantias' Stimme einen unheimlichen Klang an.{/n} "Dann wollen wir einmal sehen, welche interessanten Schäden Euer Körper erlitten hat und welche Eurer armseligen Organe sich verbessern ließen, ohne Eurer geistigen Gesundheit allzu großen Schaden zuzufügen. Versucht bitte nicht zu schreien ... einigen Versuchsstücken sind bei dieser Prozedur schon die Stimmbänder gerissen. Andererseits ... werdet Ihr so oder so schreien."
languages.original_text: {n}With a loud click of his scissor-like fingers, Tervantias voice turns ghoulish,{/n} "Let's see what kind of interesting damage your body has taken and which parts of your miserable organics can be improved without inflicting any substantial harm on your sanity. Try not to scream — some specimens end up tearing their vocal cords during this procedure. Then again... you will scream whether you want to or not."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tervantias klickt laut mit seinen scherenähnlichen Fingern und seine Stimme nimmt einen gruseligen Ton an:{/n} "Lasst mich sehen, ob Euer Körper interessante Schäden genommen hat."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}Produciendo un sonoro chasquido con sus dedos con forma de tijeras, la voz de Tervantias adquiere un tono macabro:{/n} «Veamos si tu cuerpo ha recibido daños interesantes y si puedo mejorar alguno de los componentes orgánicos sin infligir demasiado daño a tu cordura. Intenta no gritar, algunos especímenes se han dejado las cuerdas vocales durante el procedimiento. Aunque... acabarás gritando de todos modos».
languages.original_text: {n}With a loud click of his scissor-like fingers, Tervantias voice turns ghoulish,{/n} "Let's see what kind of interesting damage your body has taken and which parts of your miserable organics can be improved without inflicting any substantial harm on your sanity. Try not to scream — some specimens end up tearing their vocal cords during this procedure. Then again... you will scream whether you want to or not."

traits.locale_text: {n}Produciendo un largo chasquido con sus dedos con forma de tijeras, la voz de Tervantias adquiere un tono macabro:{/n} «Veamos si tu cuerpo ha recibido daños interesantes».
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}ハサミのような指をカチカチと大きく鳴らすと、テルヴァンティアスの声は鬼気迫るものに変わった。{/n}「お前の体が興味深いダメージを受けているのか、また、お前の正気に害を与えることなく、改善できる哀れな器官がどれであるかを確かめてみようではないか。叫ぶでないぞ…この処置で、その声帯が切れてしまう標本もいるのだ。そうなれば…望むと望まざると、お前は悲鳴を上げることとなるだろう」
languages.original_text: {n}With a loud click of his scissor-like fingers, Tervantias voice turns ghoulish,{/n} "Let's see what kind of interesting damage your body has taken and which parts of your miserable organics can be improved without inflicting any substantial harm on your sanity. Try not to scream — some specimens end up tearing their vocal cords during this procedure. Then again... you will scream whether you want to or not."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハサミのような指をカチカチと大きく鳴らすと、テルヴァンティアスの声は鬼気迫るものに変わった。{/n}「お前の体が興味深いダメージを受けているのか、また、お前の正気に害を与えることなく、改善できる哀れな器官がどれであるかを確かめてみようではないか。叫ぶでないぞ…この処置で、その声帯が切れてしまう標本もいるのだ。そうなれば…望むと望まざると、お前は悲鳴を上げることとなるだろう」
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}Makasımsı parmaklarından yüksek bir tıkırtı çıkan Tervantias, korkunç bir sesle konuşuyor.{/n} "Bedeninin ne kadar ilginç hasarlar aldığına ve aşağılık organik parçalarının hangilerinin akıl sağlığına ciddi bir hasar vermeden geliştirilebileceğine bir bakalım. Çığlık atmamaya çalış. Bazı numuneler, bu prosedür sırasında ses tellerini yırtabiliyor. Hoş, elbette istesen de istemesen de çığlık atacaksın."
languages.original_text: {n}With a loud click of his scissor-like fingers, Tervantias voice turns ghoulish,{/n} "Let's see what kind of interesting damage your body has taken and which parts of your miserable organics can be improved without inflicting any substantial harm on your sanity. Try not to scream — some specimens end up tearing their vocal cords during this procedure. Then again... you will scream whether you want to or not."

traits.locale_text: {n}Makasımsı parmaklarından yüksek bir tıkırtı çıkan Tervantias korkunç bir sesle konuşuyor.{/n} "Bedeninin ne kadar ilginç hasarlar aldığına ve aşağılık organik parçalarının hangilerinin akıl sağlığına ciddi bir hasar vermeden geliştirilebileceğine bir bakalım. Çığlık atmamaya çalış, bazı numuneler bu prosedür sırasında ses tellerini yırtabiliyor. Hoş, elbette istesen de istemesen de çığlık atacaksın."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae
